remarks:
The result of subtracting a nonnegative integer from a positive integer and adding another nonnegative integer which is less than the first one is less than the positive integer.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-May-2018.) 

---

 The result of subtracting a nonnegative integer from a positive integer and adding another nonnegative integer which is less than the first one is less then the positive integer.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-May-2018.)
